meanings.definition: Winding or twisting in a circuitous manner.
meanings.sent1: The anfractuous road through the forest made the journey longer.
meanings.sent2: The river followed an anfractuous path through the valley.
meanings.sent3: The anfractuous maze in the game was challenging but fun to navigate.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts took an anfractuous route before reaching a conclusion.
meanings.sent5: The anfractuous pattern on the rug was mesmerizing to look at.

meanings.definition: Characterized by a series of windings or turnings.
meanings.sent1: The anfractuous staircase in the old building was tiring to climb.
meanings.sent2: The anfractuous coastline offered stunning views around every bend.
meanings.sent3: The anfractuous plot of the movie kept the audience guessing until the end.
meanings.sent4: His anfractuous explanation confused everyone in the room.
meanings.sent5: The anfractuous branches of the tree intertwined like a natural sculpture.

meanings.definition: Full of windings and intricate turnings.
meanings.sent1: The anfractuous path in the garden led to a hidden fountain.
meanings.sent2: The anfractuous tunnels of the ant colony amazed the scientists.
meanings.sent3: The anfractuous conversation between the characters was hard to follow.
meanings.sent4: Her anfractuous hair cascaded down her back in beautiful curls.
meanings.sent5: The anfractuous design of the building was a marvel of architecture.
